ValidationRule.description: If the Type of 401k NSF is "Billing and Contributions" you must enter a "Yes" in Cancelled Plan Due to NSF (R coded)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Type_of_NSF__c ,"Billing and Contributions") && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Cancelled_Plan_Due_to_NSF_R_coded__c ,"Yes") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Type of 401k NSF is "Billing and Contributions" you must enter a "Yes" in Cancelled Plan Due to NSF (R coded)
